#summary nfcd - Downloading, Installation and use

= Introduction =

NFCd is a daemon which access NFC Devices and Targets. It offer D-Bus services to get devices list, targets list, target content...

Nfcd is written in C++, it use Qt, libfreefare, libndef and libnfc. 

= Installation =

You need to have CMake, Qt4 (core), libfreefare, libndef and libnfc installed on your system.

Then, you can compile and use nfcd.

{{{
svn checkout http://nfc-tools.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/nfcd nfcd
cd nfcd
mkdir build
cd build
cmake .. -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr
make
su -c 'make install clean'
-> type your root password <-
}}}

Once these commands succeed, just type:
{{{
nfcd
}}}

Note: ATM, NFCd provide D-Bus interface on user's session bus.
